name.baseName: Woolen processing ; Woolen strips and yarn category ; Washing clean wool, wool strip wool type ; Mercerized shrink-proof ; All sizes; NESPS2
毛纺加工 ; 毛条毛线类 ; 洗净毛、毛条毛线类 ; 丝光防缩 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.08，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.08，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及毛纺加工，包括清洗纯毛以及对所有尺码的毛条毛线类进行丝光防缩处理。这种处理在纺织行业中至关重要，以生产无杂质且不易缩水的各种羊毛制品。这个数据集主要适用于生产纺织品过程中环境影响评估的背景。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码17,三级代码172.0,四级代码1721文件，在完整版文件中第193页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为毛条毛线类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.43，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为99.43，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95.13，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为95.13，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.08，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / total production time (hours/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为99.08，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
